title: I updated my Pixel 4 with the google photos app and the new photo editor does not appear
content: Hello everyone, the following happened to me: I just bought a Pixel 4 and before entering my gmail account the photos app was updated and when I took a photo and touched edit, the new photo editor that released the pixel 4a and 5, it turns out that I update to android 11 and I decided to do a factory reset and then log in with my gmail account and update all the apps, but it turns out that the new photo editor no longer appears but the old one and I don't know what It is due, before I had a 2xl pixel and now 4 and I only factory reset and put my gmail account and I have already updated the google photos app to the most recent version and the new editor that shows: depth blur and others does not appear more advanced options.
